title: ‘Pervert assistant principal had sex with schoolboy six times’
text:
Assistant school principal Lisa Rothwell has been charged with having sex with a student who attended her school six times. She is pictured appearing at a bail hearing on Friday

An assistant principal had sex six times with a boy who attended her school, police say.

Lisa Rothwell, 34, reportedly had both oral sex and full sexual intercourse with the boy between April 1 this year and July 31.

Those attacks are said to have taken place outside Stuart W Cramer High School in Gaston, North Carolina, where Rothwell worked and the student studied.

She was disciplined by school bosses on Friday, and arrested shortly afterwards.

The age of Rothwell’s alleged victim is unclear, although she has been charged with felony sexual activity with a student by a school employee.

That suggests the boy may be over the North Carolina age of consent, which is 16.

But even if the boy is legally old enough to have sex, North Carolina laws still forbid teachers from having sex with any students who attend the school where they work.

They state that it is illegal for a teacher to have sex with a student ‘at any time during or after the period when the student and person were present together in the same school but before the victim stops being a student.’

Police have yet to offer further detail on how Rothwell’s alleged crimes came to light, The Gaston Gazette reported.

She appeared before a magistrate looking ashen-faced and tearful on Friday night, with the experienced teacher appearing stunned as her bond was set at $1million.

Rothwell, who has been a teacher for 10 years, has worked as an exceptional children teacher at Stuart W Cramer High sine 2014.

She was appointed to the post of assistant principal in 2015.

Rothwell is back in court Monday, and could ask for her bond to be reduced.
